articles.title: Asian Stocks Slip as Investors Await Fed Decision: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian stocks inched higher, extending their winning run to a 10th day, ahead of the Federal Reserve’s policy decision with investors speculating the central bank will cut interest rates for the first time this year.

articles.title: Marvel Studios Remembers Robert Redford - Marvel.com
articles.description: The legendary actor shared his immense talents with us in 'Captain America: The Winter Soldier' and 'Avengers: Endgame.'

articles.title: Mariners win 10th straight in record-setting game - The Seattle Times
articles.description: On a night where catcher Cal Raleigh hit two historic home runs and Dominic Canzone homered three times, the Mariners pounded the Royals 12-5 for their 10th straight win to remain in first place in the AL West.

articles.title: ‘This is Code Red’: Newsom rallies Dems in searing rebuke of Trump - Politico
articles.description: Newsom hosted a modern version of a Telethon — where guests urged viewers to donate to his redistricting campaign, and Newsom was the proto-Jerry Lewis.

articles.title: Malawi counts votes in a presidential election where economic turmoil was the top issue - AP News
articles.description: Malawi has begun counting votes in a presidential election that's expected to be a tight race between old rivals and could go to a runoff. Tuesday's vote comes at a time of economic turmoil in one of the world's least-developed countries. President Lazarus Ch…

articles.title: NASA announces "groundbreaking discovery" of life on Mars - Earth.com
articles.description: NASA’s Mars rover finds organic signals in mudstone that resemble microbial activity, sparking new debate over life on the Red Planet.

articles.title: Game Recap: Fever Rout Dream at Gainbridge Fieldhouse to Force Game 3 - Indiana Fever
articles.description: A return home was just what the Indiana Fever needed. Playing in front of a loud and fiery Gainbridge Fieldhouse crowd decked out in red “Now You Know” t-shirts, the Fever rolled to a 77-60 win over the Atlanta Dream on Tuesday in Game 2 of their …

articles.title: Israeli military begins ground invasion of Gaza City - The Washington Post
articles.description: Palestinians in Gaza City reported a night of heavy bombardment. A U.N. commission said Israel was committing genocide in Gaza; Israel rejected the claim as “falsehoods.”

articles.title: Stephen Colbert Thanks Jon Stewart & Jimmy Kimmel After ‘The Late Show’ Emmy Win - Deadline
articles.description: The Late Show with Stephen Colbert won the Emmy for Outstanding Talk Series at the awards, marking the show’s first ever win in the category.

articles.title: Key takeaways from the charges against Tyler Robinson, Charlie Kirk shooting suspect - CNN
articles.description: Prosecutors formally charged Tyler Robinson, who is accused of killing prominent conservative political activist Charlie Kirk, with aggravated murder on Tuesday and announced they would seek the death penalty.

articles.title: Russia subjecting abducted Ukrainian children to "forced militarization" at 210 facilities, study finds - CBS News
articles.description: Russia is subjecting abducted Ukrainian children to "forced militarization" at 210 facilities, even making them build drones, Yale researchers say.

articles.title: Week 6 Results + Scorecards | Dana White's Contender Series Season 9 - UFC.com
articles.description: Live Results, Fight Recaps, Contract Winner Interviews, Scorecards And More From Week 6 Of Dana White's Contender Series Season 9, Live From UFC APEX In Las Vegas On September 16
articles.source: The Official Website of the Ultimate Fighting Championship

articles.title: Northrop Grumman's Cygnus XL cargo spacecraft suffers thruster issue on way to the International Space Station - Space
articles.description: The freighter won't arrive at the ISS on Wednesday morning (Sept. 17) as planned.

articles.title: Ex-'Try Guys' Star Ned Fulmer and Wife Ariel Separate - TMZ
articles.description: Ned Fulmer -- the cofounder of "The Try Guys" who was ousted from the YouTube group after a 2022 cheating scandal -- has separated from his wife, Ariel, after 15 years together ... TMZ has learned.

articles.title: Trump discloses U.S. targeted a third alleged drug boat from Venezuela - The Washington Post
articles.description: The president acknowledged the incident while delivering a warning to Venezuela’s president, Nicolás Maduro.

articles.title: 3 takeaways from Kash Patel’s tense oversight hearing - PBS
articles.description: FBI director Kash Patel spent hours Tuesday reassuring senators he is fit to lead the bureau.

articles.title: Bond Traders Boost Bets on Half-Point Fed Rate Cuts by Year-End - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Bond traders are stepping up options wagers that the Federal Reserve will deliver at least one half-point interest-rate cut across this year’s three remaining policy meetings.
